#summary Where can I find the GWT source code? Can I submit a patch?

= Where can I find the GWT source code? Can I submit a patch? =

The GWT source code, licensed under Apache 2.0, is available [http://code.google.com/p/google-web-toolkit/ here]. If you are interested in contributing a patch, please visit the [http://code.google.com/webtoolkit/makinggwtbetter.html Making GWT Better] guide.
